channel.title: Comments on: Make 2012 the year that you will learn how to code
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Shannon
item.dc:creator: Shannon
item.description: Okay, I signed up. Sounds pretty cool. Been years since I've coded, looking forward to the CodeAcademy lessons. Over 200,000 now signed up.<br /> Thx for posting on LessThanDot (may be my first visit here, but not my last). :-)
item.content:encoded:
Okay, I signed up. Sounds pretty cool. Been years since I’ve coded, looking forward to the CodeAcademy lessons. Over 200,000 now signed up.
Thx for posting on LessThanDot (may be my first visit here, but not my last). ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: SQLArcher
item.dc:creator: SQLArcher
item.description: SIGNED UP!!! I started learning a bit already since November with C# but it just confirmed my stance that it's not really "for me". Prefer T-SQL and RDL.
item.content:encoded: SIGNED UP!!! I started learning a bit already since November with C# but it just confirmed my stance that it’s not really “for me”. Prefer T-SQL and RDL.

item.title: By: chopstik
item.dc:creator: chopstik
item.description: In theory, I know how to code but since I'm not doing it every day now, some refreshers won't hurt. Thanks for this!
item.content:encoded: In theory, I know how to code but since I’m not doing it every day now, some refreshers won’t hurt. Thanks for this!

item.title: By: Jon
item.dc:creator: Jon
item.description: Thought I would give it a try. Still relatively new to coding so it would be nice to learn some new tricks.
item.content:encoded: Thought I would give it a try. Still relatively new to coding so it would be nice to learn some new tricks.

item.title: By: SQLGator (Ed Watson)
item.dc:creator: SQLGator (Ed Watson)
item.description: I already know how to code, but this sounds neat so I signed up....maybe I will learn something new ;-)
